comments: Wellness fee

"4% will be added to your check to support the kitchen of the Antico family. 
 Gratuity is not included."

name: Baar Baar LA

name: Bacari
location: DTLA / Glendale / PdR / Silverlake / W. Adams

name: Bar Amå
comments: "18% service charge is added to all checks. The service charge allows for a more equitable distribution of pay. It is not considered a tip and is taxed per state law."

name: Bar Hermanito
comments: "5% surcharge will be added to each check to ensure competitive industry compensation, medical benefits for our staff, as well as help aid our commitment to providing health and wellness for our community. ...this surcharge is not part of our gratuity for services."

name: Barra Santos
comments: 20% Service charge “support equitable earnings, medical and retirement benefits for staff”
A server noted that this goes to the staff and said that tipping above was not necessary. On the receipt the automatic percentages to add tip if you chose to were 1%, 3%, 5%

name: Bavel
comments: "4% service charge will be added to each guest check to ensure competitive industry compensation, as well as health and medical benefits, for all of our valued full time team members. In support of this initiative, the entirety of the charge is retained by the restaurant." Removeable by request

name: Best Bet Pizzaria
comments: "Healthy LA"

name: Bestia
comments: A server noted that this actually goes to staff

name: Bicyclette Bistro
comments: A 4% service charge will be added to each guest check to ensure competitive industry compensation, as well as health and medical benefits, for all of our valued full time team members. In support of this initiative, the entirety of the charge is retained by the company.

Submitted as a current employee. Our parent company, Sprout LA is unable to provide employees with proof of where this money goes or how it is accounted for. I believe it is the businesses responsibility to pay for benefits, not the guests.

name: Birdcage
comments: "Admin fee"

Other Comments via Reddit

comments: "A 5% service charge will be added to each guest check to ensure competitive industry compensation, as well as health and medical benefits, for all of our valued full time team members. In support of this initiative, the entirety of the charge is retained by the company. If you would like this charge removed, please let our staff know."

name: Queen Street
comments: 20% Serrvice Charge "We firmly believe that the future of restaurants will reflect the international model, where staff is not reliant on gratuities from guests, and earnings are more stable.  The service charge model is the first step in this process, and we hope to lead the way as progressive operators."

Service fee not explained on the receipt. Management says they verbally tell guests when signing the initial contract that service fees do not cover tips.

name: Rosaliné
comments: "As a non-tipping restaurant, Rosaline adds a 20% administrative fee to all checks. This is not a service charge or gratuity and supports higher wages and benefits for our hourly team. If you have questions about this fee, please ask for a manager."

comments: "A 4% charge is added by the restaurant to all checks to help offer fully covered healthcare to our employees. Please let us know if you have questions. Thanks for supporting a healthier staff!!"

comments: Tax charged post-tip (15% Autograt)

name: The Albright
comments: 10% 🤷‍♀️ Fee, Report: "I wasn't asked to tip on top of the fee."

name: The Black Cat
comments: An optional 4% charge added to pay workers a living wage.

name: The Butcher's Daughter
comments: "AN OPTIONAL 3% HEALTH AND WELLNESS FEE HAS BEEN ADDED TO THE BILL TO SUPPORT HEALTH INSURANCE FOR OUR STAFF."

name: The Coffee Company
comments: 3% surcharge when ordering via app

name: The Misfit
comments: "A 4% charge is added to all checks that will be distributed entirely to our hardworking kitchen staff."
4% does go to the employees, but the owner pays the employees 4% less now.

name: The Rose
comments: "A 5% charge will be added to your check to help cover the cost of health care benefits that we offer our full time employees. Thank you for supporting our staff. If you would like this charge removed, please let your server know and the charge will be removed."

name: The Semi-Tropic
comments: owners keep significant portion of tips

name: The Sherman
comments: “…to help cover the cost of health benefits and wages for our staff”.  20% autograt for parties 6 or more (receipt will still recommend full 20-25% add'l tip)

name: The Six
comments: "3% surcharge has been added to your check"

name: The Terrace @ Marbourne Hotel
comments: "For your convenience, a 20% service charge will be added" during Breakfast, Brunch, and large Lunch & Dinner parties

name: The Terrace at Marybourne
comments: 20% service charge

name: Tipsy Cow
comments: 3% service charge fee "retained by restaurant"

name: Tu Madre
comments: 5% Service Charge

name: Uovo
comments: "No tipping" establishment

name: Urban Plates
comments: Order, then go to check out and it will show the 3%. Not a tip.

name: Vino Wine & Tapas Room
comments: "Prices reflect cash pricing. A 3.8% fee is charged for all credit card transactions. 20% gratuity is charged for parties of 5 or more and checks over $200"

name: Vitello's
comments: 3.5% Kitchen appreciation fee (removable by request)

name: Win~dow
comments: 3% Happy & Healthy Surcharge

name: Wolfsglen
comments: "3% surcharge. This is not a service charge or gratuity and will not be paid to your. server." "20% gratuity will be added to parties of 6 or greater"

name: Wong's Wok
comments: Word is, owners keep Credit Card tips

name: Wood Pizza
comments: Including pick-up orders

name: Xuntos
comments: 20% service charge per them "non-negotiable."

name: Yang's Kitchen
comments: "1% ZFP Restore the Planet fee is added to your bill to help restore the planet and combat climate change. You can opt out of this fee if you’d like"

name: Zuzu's Pretzels
comments: "A 5% service charge will be added to each guest check to ensure competitive industry compensation for all of our valued full time team members. In support of this initiative, the entirety of the charge is retained by the company."

name: iRoll Ice Cream
comments: $1 Service Fee is added on each ice cream

name: n10 Restaurant
comments: "20% service charge will be added to the bill"
